Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 DSLR w/2 Lenses+32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
Reviews.Author: Uchenna Udoha
Reviews.Content: I like photography a lot. I went for this unit, looking for a system that would give me something more advanced than what I used to get from the last camera I had before this, which was a Sony Cybershot WX-9 Point & Shoot digital camera, 16.2megapixel. Though I purchased it for personal use, It makes me feel like a professional photographer. From the compactness of the unit, the picture quality, the illustration DVD, the mini-tripod, the compact carrying case etc., it was worth the money spent. The Sigma 70-300mm lens is such a machine. I will recommend it for anybody.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera but accessories not so much
Reviews.Author: Robert Collins
Reviews.Content: Everything came as ordered and I love theNikon D3200 and lenses. The rest of the accessories are of poor quality. Screen cover is very cheap film and the tripod is very thin and not sturdy at all. You are buying a Nikon Camera but the kit includes a Vivatar camer bag.Back to the Camera though as this is the reason for the purchase. I have always owned Nikons and this one did not disappoint. I have yet to use the camera at 24 MP and the pictures are still as sharp as any camera I have ever owned. The menu and controls are very easy to learn.  I know there are more expensive cameras out there but I could never justify spending more as with my skill level this camera does it all.

Reviews.Title: Great camera....the price not so.
Reviews.Author: Mom "H. S"
Reviews.Content: This is the first expensive camera I ever bought . I was always hesitating because I thought I could have the same quality out of a less expensive one. The main reason I bought this camera was my frustration when taking pictures of my children, since we know they can't stay still for more that a second and my Fujifilm camera took way too long to take the picture from the moment I pressed the button. I love this camera for that reason; with just a click I am able to take pics faster than ever before!!!  A big plus. Now, the downside is, this kit comes with so many extra items that are not really "free". I felt so disappointed when I saw this same camera and the Sigma Lens at Target for about $500.I don't see the need of all that extra-stuff, other than the tripod which I haven't used. So shop around first and look for whatever works for you.Other than that I highly recommend this camera. I bought it at the last minute because I was going on vacation and didn't want to risk the good memories!! Perfect for people with kids as it takes pictures fast and with great quality.P.D. The SIM/Memory card that came with the kit, didn't work, even though it was brand new. The kit comes with a 32G Sony memory. I just contacted customer service and was offer a 5% discount for the damage memory card, which I gladly accepted.

Reviews.Title: The Best Intro DSLR In Town.
Reviews.Author: Writing Boy "Edmon Armstrong"
Reviews.Content: I Love, Love, Love this camera. I needed to buy a great quality camera for my Intro to Photography class in college, and let me tell you this set is all i needed.If you are looking for a camera to give as a great gift, or need a camera for a business; buy this camera set.This set includes everything you will need if you own a camera of this calibre.1. Nikon D3200- 24.2Mp - Great settings and easy to use manual functions2. Standard 18-55mm Nikon Lens - Takes great pictures in a studio3. Nikon Sigma Telophoto Lens with a Macro Lens function - Great for taking close up and faraway pictures4. 32GB memory card - Holds about over 300 pictures even if you take pics in RAW+Jpeg5. Tripod6. Compatible cords for your Tv(HD) and computer7.Memory card adapter in case you do not have a computer with an SD card lot8. Camera cleaning kit  -  I would not use this kit if I was you. This camera cost a pretty penny and unless you have been cleaning cameras for years, just take it in to a camera shop to get cleand.

Reviews.Title: The camera itself is fantastic however the seller
Reviews.Author: Christopher Mahon
Reviews.Content: Its not the camera thats a problem. The camera itself is fantastic however the seller, 33 Street Camera I'm not happy with. First the camera bag that came with the package was covered in mold. The mold was all over the bag and just disgusting and finally I never received  The Jumpstart Guide to Digital Photography, No LCD Screen Protectors, No Memory Card Wallet and No Promo Code for 25 Free Prints. Whats worse, is when I went online to enter my warranty information on My Nikon Account, Nikon told me this Camera was a Grey Market Item and is not covered by Nikons Warranty. The only way to have it fixed would be to send it back to 33 Street Camera and hope they can get it fixed should anything happen. So be warned, this camera is not being sold by an authorized retailer. The definition of Grey Market Products is as follows...A grey market (also spelled gray market), or parallel market, is the trade of a commodity through distribution channels which, while legal, are unofficial, unauthorized, or unintended by the original manufacturer. So be warned, although the deal sounds great, there have been a lot of problems and worse off no warranty!Update... Turns out an associate was the problem with 33 street camera. I have changed my rating to 3 stars from two because I am still concerned about the camera being a grey market item, however I was told by 33 Street Camera that they offer a 3 year warranty. I am overall pleased with how 33 Street Camera resolved my problems. As soon as the owner/manager got wind of the issues I was having he immediately contacted me by phone to correct the problems. Unfortunately, it was just one associate that made things difficult. The owner/manager immediately shipped the missing items, offered a set of lenses/filters for macro photography to apologize for the problems and shipped them all overnight as well. I even told him he didn't have to ship overnight and that regular mail would be fine but he insisted on correcting the issue immediately. Overall I am pleased with their level of customer service and cannot fault them for one associates misgivings.

Reviews.Title: Good package
Reviews.Author: Bill Adams
Reviews.Content: Everything in the package works fine.  I recommend getting the d3200 manual online as a pdf and buying the book "Nikon D3200 for Dummies".  It has so many settings and options that you need to visit each one at least once to know what the camera is capable of.

Reviews.Title: Perfect! Love my Camera!
Reviews.Author: SofiaH1990
Reviews.Content: For those who want to know if this product comes with a Flash, battery and charger. It does. The camera has a built in flash. I asked the seller and they said it did not, but it does. I love everything about this camera. The money is well worth it. Everything came in perfect condition and I am very satisfied with my choice in buying this camera. I have kids and Great Danes, so I always love taking pictures. Especially when I have puppies. I was recommended to buy this camera by a friend, and I am happy with the recommendation.

Reviews.Title: My 1st Nikon
Reviews.Author: awack
Reviews.Content: I've been shooting for about 7 years now and previously with an Olympus Evolt 500.  I was excited to make the switch over to the Nikon and I'm glad I did.  The Olympus DSLR was a great starter camera and worked well, but the Nikon D3200 is so far my favorite.  The only downfall is that I thought that the 70-300mm lens would have the VR image stabilizer as the 18-55mm lens does, but sadly it doesn't, thus my 4 star only rating.  Plus in order for me to provide a 5 star it better be able to take the picture and process the editing as well. LOL Anyway, great camera, highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: great buy!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Disbennett
Reviews.Content: This was a really good buy. The kit came with everything I needed to begin working with the Nikon.  It arrived as scheduled with no wait time and everything listed was included

Reviews.Title: Great Product, I have never owned a good camera.
Reviews.Author: Scott D. Stoner
Reviews.Content: I have never owned a good camera until now.  I relaly like the ability to switch between manual and automatic.  I am typically a manual kind of person.  When I cannot get my shot I put it in auto and see what the basic setting are, then i go back to manual and try to mimic changing what I think makes the shot look better.  I could not think of a camera I would rather be using.

Reviews.Title: This is a great kit
Reviews.Author: Dolly
Reviews.Content: Our primary focus in making a purchase like this was to simply purchase the camera.  We purchased this for Christmas of this past year and it arrived at our home just in time for the celebration of Jesus' birthday with our extended family.  Since the kit was so complete, we had no concerns over needing any other accessories and were able to begin taking pictures almost immediately (after the battery was charged).The larger lens is especially fun to use in outdoor settings to catch my young boys at play (without being caught with camera in hand!).One thing that has frustrated me in the past with other cameras has been the slow response time between pushing the shutter button to the picture actually being taken.  This camera has been super responsive and that has been especially good with my three active, young boys.This is a camera that I would recommend for anyone who is wanting to be able to take a higher quality photograph without needing to have a great deal of knowledge about high-speed photography.  The automatic settings are very easy to use and so far the captured images have been wonderful.  My understanding is that it is also great for those who do have such photographic knowledge since you can use it on a completely manual setting as well.

Reviews.Title: Just what she needed.
Reviews.Author: shaun
Reviews.Content: I bought the Nikon D3200 along with the Sigma zoom lens for my wife who's father is battling throat cancer.  I hoped that it would lift her spirits and it has certainly done that.  She LOVES the camera and it's  many, many features.  The photos are so clear with the 24.2 megapixel.  She is so happy with the camera.  Well worth the money especially considering the return of investment.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, skip the bundle
Reviews.Author: Jon "Jo"
Reviews.Content: As others have said, the camera is great for as an entry level or intermediate SLR.  Lenses are good also - note that the telephoto does not have image stabilization.  However, unless you can get the entire bundle for the same cost as just the camera and lenses, I recommend buying the camera and any components that you want separately.The bag is OK, and the HDMI cable came in handy.  The tripod is useless.  Besides being flimsy, the first one we received had a broken leg.  It was replaced with another - the same flimsy model.  The legs stick and will barely fold up.  We aren't going to bother sending it back again.  Even when it works, it can barely hold the camera steady.  The first card reader was broken, and the screen protectors are low quality.Again, it is a great camera, but I recommend deciding what components you want, researching them, and buying them individually.  I think the bundle was just a way for the seller to unload some extra merchandise.

Reviews.Title: Pixibytes Rocks!
Reviews.Author: Jason Lewis
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Nikon D3200 32gig package from Amazon and it was shipped from a company called Pixibytes Co. in NY. I received the package yesterday and everything that ordered was in the box and accounted for! Nothing was damaged. I called them for a couple of concerns I had with the accessories and their customer service department was awesome!!! They young lady was very polite and extremely helpful!! She was very prompt on fixing my issues and seemed very egar to make sure she had a happy customer! I ordered this camera mainly for taking pics of my toddler and family and Im very pleased with the whole package. The camera takes incredible photos and I do suggest getting the 70/300 lens package. You cant go wrong with it! The only thing I wish the package had in addition to both lens was the professional flash... :( but when the time comes to get one I will be ordering from Pixibytes Co. aswell as any other photo related accessories! Big thanks to Pixibytes Co. for there professionalism and prompt to customer service!! Let the digital memories begin!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Totally enjoying how to use it and capture pictures of my childern.  i even was able to voom in enough to capture pictures of my son as quarterback and with the rapid frames/sec. i was able to capture the entire play

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 kit
Reviews.Author: Spencer Trauntvein
Reviews.Content: Very good package. The sigma lens is very high quality and the whole thing is a very good start for a new DSL-R photographer

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: JANIE B.
Reviews.Content: Just got back from vacation and it was the first time that I used it but even though I was learning it took over 700 beautiful pictures. I got some great shots of alligators and a pair of Bald Eagles with the long range lens.

Reviews.Title: All i expected and more
Reviews.Author: Jennifer McMurphy
Reviews.Content: All I expected and more!  I like the bundle with all of the equipment that I would had to bought anyways

Reviews.Title: everything and more
Reviews.Author: R. Kassis
Reviews.Content: I finally made this purchase and I am very pleased! Everything works and was packed very well. Battery charges quickly and lasts. My pictures look fantastic. I am getting back into photography since I was young!Great buy and great price

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera for the money!!!
Reviews.Author: Chuck Leonard
Reviews.Content: I have been a photographer for 30+ years and this camera really blew me away! Even if you never used an SLR camera before, You can take great photos right out of the box. Faster than you could even with a smart phone (yuck). Would recommend this camera for everyone out there!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: rapp432
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I'm still getting used to it but I love the way the pictures come out. It definitely helps to read any information about the camera to help know how to use it and where everything is. Also this bundle was a great price and very helpful for starting out.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price.
Reviews.Author: christopher
Reviews.Content: Fun to learn the different settings and adjustments but also takes excellent pictures on pre-programed settings. The program disk that came with the camera is great for adjustments or customizing the photos as well.

Reviews.Title: gave as a gift
Reviews.Author: Mary E. Hofhine "marel"
Reviews.Content: gave this to a daughter for Christmas since I only got to use it for a short while I can't rate it any higer.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: kc
Reviews.Content: Sick of replacing small digital cameras every year or two.  Don't need everything in the bundle, but the price was excellent.  Very easy to use - amateur photographer that takes tons of pics.  Did lots of research on Canon and Nikon and talked to pro photographer friends who basically said the only real difference between the two is how it feels in your hand.  I am sure I would've been just as pleased with Canon but the Nikon was priced better in this bundle for better features.

Reviews.Title: Cheap tripod and card reader.
Reviews.Author: Becky O
Reviews.Content: Camera and lenses are great but very disappointed in the tripod. One leg broke the first time we used it. The Card reader is also subpar.

Reviews.Title: Have a terrible time focusing
Reviews.Author: Bob "Trailerhauler"
Reviews.Content: Bought two bundles. Bundle is overall a good deal. Have had problems with the Nikon D3200. Very difficult, to impossible to get reliable focusing with the bigger lens. Have to carefully focus with auto, then reshoot using manual focus. That's fine unless you are in a hurry, such as shooting birds, or moving objects. Overall camera use is OK, but focus function stinks. Sorry I got rid of my older Olympus for this.

Reviews.Title: d3200 nikon
Reviews.Author: manolo
Reviews.Content: good camera kid, , I am new to this I am learning to use the camera, , only one problem with the tripod, was broken, but the seller replaced with a new,,

Reviews.Title: Great package deal!
Reviews.Author: Callie Calhoun
Reviews.Content: Wow! I can't say enough about this package! It was fantastic for the price. I have already downloaded, installed, did Christmas photos and emailed friends. Love it and happy I purchased with the company. The only thing that didn't work was the Serif X3 editing software. It isn't compatible with my new laptop/notebook which has Windows 8. So, when I called the Serif Company I upgraded to their Serif X6 for a fraction of the online cost and then everything went smoothly. I have been using this camera, the tri-pod and both lenses since I got them. I am thrilled with the package!

Reviews.Title: Generally excellent
Reviews.Author: G. C. Budd
Reviews.Content: The camera is excellent and everything in the outfit arrived well packed. All except the tripod were fully functional and useful. The tripod is well- made but flimsy. I would give five stars if it was a better tripod. Generally I am very pleased with the outfit.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Katherine
Reviews.Content: I love it!!!!! Its the best purchase I've made in Amazon! Highly Recommended. Each item came in the best conditions and it is working perfectly! Im in love with my excellent and new camera and accesories! :)

Reviews.Title: Great! Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Jamel Fraser
Reviews.Content: This product was fantastic, everything came as expected. Great quality. The Sigma lens was the high quality touch I needed for those great shots.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: K. Mankowski
Reviews.Content: camera is light weight and easy to use.  Just got back from vacation and got  some great shots. My sister purchased one.

Reviews.Title: Detailed yet simple
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: The documentaion that comes with the camera is very self simple.  I was using the camera the same day for simple pictures.  I purchased a book - the Nikon D3200 Digital Field Guide - also through Amazon and it has simplified the camera all the more.  I am truly an amateur but already taking what i feel are professional shots.

Reviews.Title: Luv itI
Reviews.Author: st
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a DSLR for a long time. I saw this kit on sale and jumped on it. I got the 55-300 mm tele lens also, The settings are a little harder to figure out than my Nikon F2 but I am getting it. I took over 300 photos at a RC fly in and some of the pictures are magazine quality, and I took them in auto.

Reviews.Title: Great Package
Reviews.Author: Winfred Dodge.
Reviews.Content: I was replacing a film camera that was stolen, it was an easy transition, even for  me, I love it

Reviews.Title: One great camera!
Reviews.Author: John W Brown
Reviews.Content: Beyond all expectations! Easy to use, even if your not a great picture taker this camera will make you one.

Reviews.Title: Not too bad of a Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: There were two items of concern.  The standard lens for some reason the photos are slightly out of focus.  Did find some debri on the lens during use which was easily removed.  The telephoto lens takes better photos.  The case after a few uses, one of the latches broke.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my girl as a Christmas present. Gave it to her early so she could take pictures throughout the holiday season and she is very happy with it. The quality of the pictures are excellent. Everything it came with is nice. I would definitely recommend this buy to anyone who is looking for a great camera bundle package.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with Nikon D3200 SLR bundle
Reviews.Author: Nancy Eade
Reviews.Content: It took great pictures in Yosemite and San Francisco. The camera is easy to handle and the storage san disk is huge.

Reviews.Title: Latest Nikon Acquasition
Reviews.Author: DNA Dave
Reviews.Content: Everything was as expected, except the tri-pod. It fell apart the first time I went to use it. Although the item was a free addition to the package it would be better to not send it out as it truly isn't worth a dollar which is probably about the cost of the materials to build it.On a much more positive note the remainder of the package was and still is GREAT and I would highly recommend anyone considering the purchase to go ahead and do it. You'll be happy you did.,http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0085YS9CE/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_title

Reviews.Title: Great item!
Reviews.Author: tand05
Reviews.Content: This item was a great bundle. I did not like that the extra lens was a off brand but it works fine for a beginner. All in all, excellent package deal for the price

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: A. Harston "ACH"
Reviews.Content: Coming from a Nikon D50 to this is mind blowing. Where have you been all my life D3200? I was a little hesitant at first, but this camera is amazing and so reasonably priced. I love Nikon. You can't beat this package deal either. I love everything in this package.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Tammy Poggi
Reviews.Content: i absolutely love my camera and the whole kit!  I try to take it everywhere I go!  The pictures are great and all the accessories are even better to have everything together works wonderfully!  I love this camera and the guide feature is perfect you just set it to what you want to take a picture of and it sets the camera for you!

Reviews.Title: Amazing price for this camera And accessories
Reviews.Author: Z. T. Pagliere "Dr.Zy"
Reviews.Content: The price for the camera and all the accessories was great. Just the telephoto would cost another $200+.We are very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Love my camera
Reviews.Author: Virginia J. Taylor
Reviews.Content: Love the camera an lenses, you will need a good instruction book, Nikon instruction bookletHard to follow for someone new to photography.Auto shoot excellent, if all you need is a great point an shoot cameraI enjoy nature photography an use all the bells and whistles

Reviews.Title: Awesome .
Reviews.Author: george mathew
Reviews.Content: Nikon D3200 is awesome . Good for starters and easy to handle . Pictures are clear. Worth to buy this bundle.

Reviews.Title: Great for aircraft spotting!
Reviews.Author: Ryan C. Kelly
Reviews.Content: With so many cameras out there, it was a tough decision. I couldn't be happier with the one I made! Great camera, simple and easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Dan Fry
Reviews.Content: Features of camera are better than expected,and quality of photos were exceptional.Items included in the package were beneficial and a help in camera usage.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Hannah Williams
Reviews.Content: we've had no problems with the sd card that came with it, works great. We love both lenses, it's so much fun to use. The case doesn't seem very protective to me, and doesn't hold everything, but it's still nice to have.

Reviews.Title: Perfect choice
Reviews.Author: controller
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I have actually started having people ask me to take baby and senior pics.  They saw the great pics I have done on my own family.  Every accessory was high quality and just what I needed.I have actually recommended this camera to many of my friends and they have purchased.  They love it as well.

Reviews.Title: Good deal. Love the camera.
Reviews.Author: G. Bothum
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this package and camera. Very easy to use, yet capability in room to grow with photographic techniques as we learn and use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Parrothead
Reviews.Content: Got this for wife for her birthday, she loves it, we upgraded with an extra lens, got a tamron on ebay, works just as good as nikon

Reviews.Author: stephanie vacio
Reviews.Content: Great camera!!! Everything just as described.  Great quality pictured. Really recommend it to everyone working in the photography field or just like taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Ron Allen
Reviews.Content: A great camera and fantastic starting bundle to support the camera at a great price.  I have been using it to photograph local sporting events so far and those pictures have come out well.  I look forward to getting more creative, and doing more scenic, and hopefully being able to do some descent portraits.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera
Reviews.Content: This camera is very light weight friendly to use and is the perfect camera for the entry level photographer that is ready to move into the more advanced camera.  The clarity of the pictures have been outstanding and with the 24MP you can enlarge the picture with no lose of quality

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Lehman
Reviews.Content: i recently was using a Fujifilm camera and was looking to upgrade my personal camera, my friend at work recently got this camera and after i looked at it and played around for a bit i liked the camera. So i ordered mine and since then i take it everywhere with me to catch any moment including sports and family members, This is an A++ camera and would definetly reccomend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 3200 package
Reviews.Author: Greg A. Hood
Reviews.Content: This is a great package. I am really pleased as it has awesome focus potential. I would highly recoment it for the camera expert. Everything worked right from the box.

Reviews.Title: Great birding photos with Nikon D3200
Reviews.Author: Linda J Heibel Pridgen
Reviews.Content: I love the Nikon and the Sigma 70-300mm F4-5.6 lens has proven to be worth it's salt! Without a zoom lens I can't take bird pics but now I can load into my computer and zoom in without quality loss. I was disappointed with the stand, but had one of my own so it doesn't matter to me. It came as part of the bundle, but I was most interested in the camera and zoom lens. I would highly recommend it and others on my FB who are also birders have the same camera. We are satisfied with our choice I'd say.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Jeff H.
Reviews.Content: This was a great package deal. I have used the camera and lenses to produce some wonderful photographs. I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Love the Camera
Reviews.Author: KMReady
Reviews.Content: Love the Camera... The bag was not as advertised and the tripod is lightweight and would not support a large lens.

Reviews.Title: Great bargain
Reviews.Author: Oleg B
Reviews.Content: All arrived brand new  in great working condition. Great package. I know someone who bought worse camera, less accessories with lower specs and paid  nearly $1500.. I glad to own a professional grade camera for that kind of price. Pictures come out perfect and crisp. But plan ahead for some education on how to use it. Its not a regular "snap-n-go" camera.. it comes with DVD though which is really convenient.

Reviews.Title: The best camera
Reviews.Author: Walter Esquivel Aragon
Reviews.Content: I thoug it going to be a good camera but is the best camera i have al the accesories aré perfect and súper price for it, i had a problem whit the shipping but they help me so good

Reviews.Title: 100% Satisfied & Happy
Reviews.Author: M. Gonzales "K.Brown"
Reviews.Content: I fell in love with my new DSLR when I first open the package. I was impressed with the speedy shipping so my anxiety was short lived... Now I have it for 2 weekends already and hundreds of high quality photos and videos. "I think I'm a pro" #upgrade

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Teri Mayhew
Reviews.Content: Fun and easy to use. The pictures are so clear and they look very professional. Lots of extras in this purchase.

Reviews.Title: excellent value
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Great equipment for the price. This is an excellent package deal. Sony memory card should be replaced with a better quality card.  It failed within 2 days.  I replaced the card with a very inexpensive and a medium priced card without any issues.  NOT a Sony supporter any longer.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Jackie Regalado
Reviews.Content: We received a great deal on the bundle, we got more for our money. The camera is awesome, I love it. Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Mashensic
Reviews.Content: Absolutely excellent product. Camera takes beautiful pictures and all the accessories work just as they are susposed to! For the price it is really a steal! Thank you very much!!

Reviews.Title: Thank you so much!
Reviews.Author: ryan macdonell
Reviews.Content: Merry Christmas!!!!!!!!!!! Perfect!! Knocked it out of the ballpark. No more dog house for me... she hasn't put it down.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera
Reviews.Author: Carrie Williams
Reviews.Content: I love my camera.  It has everything i needed to get started.I recommend this product to anyone wanting a good camera

Reviews.Title: Terrific camera!
Reviews.Author: metrix
Reviews.Content: Excellent value compared to other sites! Excellent camera, given as gift and takes great quality pictures at professional level. Would purchase another!

Reviews.Title: Nikon DLSR
Reviews.Author: Karen McGuigan
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR camera and is a beautiful camera to start off photography.This particular offer had many extras that will enhance my learning. Battery life is very long - I have been playing with the camera for over a month with the first charge. Came well packaged! Do be aware that Canadians may have extra charges on arrival.

Reviews.Title: Great Bundle!
Reviews.Author: jkbogart
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! A lot to it! Everything in the bundle came as stated and works wonderful!! I bought a separate bundle with a flash, Tele lens, wide angle lens, filters, macro lenses, and some other stuff that went well with the d3200 and had to purchase a different bag. I bought the amazon basics camera bag that looks like a book bag. Everything was truly a wonderful buy. I'm delighted.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200
Reviews.Author: grandpa
Reviews.Content: Overall very pleased with total package.  However when I tried to register it with Nikon I found out it's what they call a GRAY MARKETcamera.  That only applied to the D3200 not the additional lens.  Disappointed that this was not noted in the review.  In other wordsif you have problems Nikon does not cover under it's warranty and you have to go back to the seller to correct the problem

Reviews.Title: Good Camera and good value
Reviews.Author: John T Cox
Reviews.Content: I am a beginner photographer and was looking for an introductory camera. I don't have any gear and very little knowledge. I needed a camera to learn on and see what features I would actually use. I have taken about 1000 pics on the camera so far and I really like it. This is not the highest end gear but that is what I expected. It gave me a good jumping off point without spending a ton of money.The shipping was right on time even during the busy holiday season.I bought this on a recommendation from a friend and another friend had bought this package on my recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Daryl Smith
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera. But not for $1200.00. Wait for the Black Friday or around Christmas. Way cheaper. Te tripod is a little cheep. Overall a good camera kit.

Reviews.Title: Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: susan hocutt
Reviews.Content: Love my new Nikon camera with all the extras. Was perfect for taking Christmas pictures of my family, especially my granddaughter.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Fern
Reviews.Content: I returned the one I bought at best buy to buy this camera.  Best price and more equipment.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Jason Burton
Reviews.Content: Great camera. No issues yet and it came with all the associated parts and items as advertised. My wife is using the camera and is loving it.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 24.2MP
Reviews.Author: Carlas A Ballhagen
Reviews.Content: Got this Camera as a Christmas gift and absolutely love it. The pictures are so crisp and clear. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking to purchase one in the future. Great Price..

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Chris Horton
Reviews.Content: I searched for the best deal on this camera for about a month and this was by far the most bang for my buck!!  Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Silverhorse
Reviews.Content: First of all the shipment was lightning fast, with standard shipping I think I received it within 4 days. Packaging was really good too. Im still learning how to use the camera but it takes beautiful pictures.  We used the tripod for Christmas family photos and it worked great, even comes with a level.All of the things included in the kit just made it so easy to get started right away.

Reviews.Title: Good deal with this product.
Reviews.Author: Jane Nguyen
Reviews.Content: This is good stuff and good price too. You  have a complete set of camera with a great deal and  easy to use, good quality pictures. The zoom lens made in Japan.

Reviews.Title: great camera and great package!
Reviews.Author: Jodi
Reviews.Content: I am a mother who loves to photograph her family, especially her children!  I haven't had this camera long so I am still learning and may never learn to use all of its features effectively.  It takes great pictures & I am enjoying it immensely!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS!
Reviews.Author: Misty K Hanna
Reviews.Content: Myu husband ordered this for me as a Christmas gift, I had to wait to open it. Now the Christmas has passed I have been using it like crazy taking pictures of everything. The DVD was helpful as a quick get started guide and it had a couple extra features I didn't expect. Helps you get some great pictures. The case is sturdy enough to hold everything it comes with and this was a great deal! Recommended to anyone who enjoys taking pictures and wants to take better ones.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Chad Jones
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it a lot but the pictures that I have taken have been amazing.  It does take some reading to become familiar with all of the things the camera can do.

Reviews.Title: NOT BE THE LAST, HAS EVERYTHING YOU NEED IS NEEDED!!!
Reviews.Author: HAMILTON ALVEZ
Reviews.Content: As a novice user, I have found great performance, ease of use and affordable price, three qualities I was looking for a digital SLR camera.

Reviews.Title: New Camera
Reviews.Author: Gloria Erker
Reviews.Content: I just started to use this camera but it is much better then my old one. So far I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: ogrenized
Reviews.Content: Have enjoyed what I have seen so far.  Looking forward to learning more about it.  It is a very nice bundle.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera - does all I need and much more!
Reviews.Author: jeff51515
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the money!  Decided to get the kit since I wanted a tele lens as well.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: roman velasco
Reviews.Content: the best bundle product everything its  prefect and the i get the camera in the estimated time the price is good for everything you get

Reviews.Title: Great price for a camera with all the goodies
Reviews.Author: Catkeeper
Reviews.Content: Great price for a really fine camera, with all the attachments!  It was a gift for a graduating graphic arts student and she loved it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Ronald Goguen
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Can't wait to put it through it's paces. First time out took some great sun rises over Rehoboth Beach, DE, then of the Flatirons in Boulder, CO.

Reviews.Title: New SLR user
Reviews.Author: Sue135
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with an SLR camera. I had read other's recommendations & completely agree that this is easy to learn. The picture quality is wonderful. I am just a casual user & know that I am looking forward to taking pictures of the grandkids' activities. I just returned from an Alaskan cruise & those pictures are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: Summer Miller
Reviews.Content: I am an amateur photographer. This camera does everything I want it to PLUS about a 100 other things. I've only had it about 3 weeks but have logged over 2000 photos already!  I look forward to REALLY learning how to use it's more advanced features in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Judie Gorra
Reviews.Content: It's everything I hoped it would be.  I'm taking great pictures with it .  Easy to use and everything I need.

Reviews.Title: A excellent camera for my needs.
Reviews.Author: hmposadas2000
Reviews.Content: This item is exactly what I wanted.  I apologize for the late reply on this product.  Anyways, since I have purchased this item, the camera has been with me to southeast Asia and has taken several excellent pictures.  Thank you for this item, prompt delivery, and excellent packaging.  I would suggest this camera for anyone that loves taking digital pictures.  I give 5r stars to the seller.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Jairo Pinilla De Unidas "andres pinilla"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product, very well prepared and the presentation in that well is the best so I recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Great deal!!
Reviews.Author: Kenzo Joma
Reviews.Content: Great Bundle for a great price, this camera is just amazing. The only problem is that doesnt include a flash.

Reviews.Title: EXCEPTIONALLY AWE-INSPIRING!
Reviews.Author: T Mai T
Reviews.Content: I love I love my new Nikon D3200!  I am a beginner and I love taking photos. I did not own this type of camera before, I didn't know anything about ISO..low-light photos.. I have been practicing my new camera, and  I feel comfortable taking photos at night.  I bought this camera for my Japan and Viet Nam vacation. I cannot wait to put my camera into some serious work! :)  I am totally happy with the camera and the whole package!

Reviews.Title: Came in as open BOX , Missing battery and Broken Tripod
Reviews.Author: Dr. K Brar
Reviews.Content: I  got  this for my brother's wife, she opened it this morning and found missing battery and Broken tripod. I can't get in touch with the seller, Amazon is giving me a run-around.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Ksr96
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for beginners!  I just had a baby a few months ago and I wanted a camera to capture the moments and I don't regret one but purchasing this one.

Reviews.Title: it is good
Reviews.Author: Leixiang Y.
Reviews.Content: I love its live view function, the photo quality is also perfect. It is worth to buy for the beginners of SLR camera.

Reviews.Title: nikon d3200 24.2
Reviews.Author: Peggy Sue Wilburn
Reviews.Content: i love this camera. it makes every photo look like a professional photographer has taken it.  i have taken lots of pictures over the years with other nikon digital cameras, i did not do them proud!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Karen E. Smitko
Reviews.Content: this is exactly as represented. I Love this camera and all the goodies that came in the bundle. It has made my picture taking hobby so much more enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: ana lucia gomes
Reviews.Content: I didn't have problem with my purchase. I'm glad with the camera. The deliver was on time.  it's very well to me.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Air
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from my Canon Digi Rebel XTI.  I couldn't be happier.  With double the MP's, and a much faster response, it makes my life so much easier.

Reviews.Title: Super like it!!!
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Purchase this stuff a month ago and it really meet my expectation.Love it!!!To anyone out there who are planning to buy one.I recommend it so much.And one thing, it is easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Kathy"
Reviews.Content: so far i have had my camera for a couple of months. I have taken sports pictures only. I have not done any playing around with the options on the camera yet. I plan to start very soon. So far I am very pleased with the quality of my photos. The rapid shots with the sports pictures has worked well also. I think I will be very pleased once I get more time to sit down and really get to know the camera. Everything showed up when expected. No problems with any of the equipment so far. This was my birthday present to myself and I couldn't be more pleased!

Reviews.Title: Wonderfullllll
Reviews.Author: Luzia Teruya
Reviews.Content: I can't describe what I felt when I got that...It's a super, mega hiper camera.... I loved it....It's a good choice!

Reviews.Title: Customer service
Reviews.Author: Robert Pelletier
Reviews.Content: The bundle is a great deal, but the camera bag came without a shoulder strap. Amazon's solution was to send the entire bundle back in order to get the strap. I had already opened the entire box. The camera and bundle items were fine otherwise. This should have been an easy fix for Amazon, but to send every item back is insane.

Reviews.Title: Great camera- easy to start point & shoot
Reviews.Author: Susan W
Reviews.Content: Easy camera to use. I haven't viewed the DVDs that came with it yet, so I know I will be getting even better picture quality once I learn more. Very light wt, fits in my hands easily.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL!!!
Reviews.Author: yamila
Reviews.Content: This camera is actually the most frustrating thing to use. I have experience with other cameras whether they be DSLR or film cameras. It's cumbersome and adjusting the settings is unnecessarily complicated or tedious. I also hate all of the accessories that came along with it. They are the cheapest accessories that could ever be found! Are you kidding me? Am I expected to clean my lens with this garbage? NO THANK YOU. Needless to say, this bundle is a waste of your time and money.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: I like the camera.  Lots to learn.  The flash drive does not have the memory card as I thought.  Otherwise, so far good product.

Reviews.Title: Buen producto
Reviews.Author: Paolo Saltori
Reviews.Content: Completisimo pack y de muy buena calidad.Trae todo lo necesario para hacer fotografías de calidad, por lo menos a nivel amateur, y un instructivo muy útil para novatos.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Andres r.
Reviews.Content: Yes, this is a good camera i really like it. I just thought it was with a macro lent but anyway this camera is awesome.

Reviews.Title: The tripods is low quality  and the bag is small but al other this are very good
Reviews.Author: Joseph Botros
Reviews.Content: New tripods with hight quality And bigger bag in order to put all the camera kits ... .... .... ...

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money!
Reviews.Author: D. Bachmann "Rhaknid"
Reviews.Content: Bag was to small for the camera, camera felt more like a toy, Sigma Lens was horrible.  The only thing positive was the items arrived on time and packaged well.  Worth the extra money for the Canon T4i or the Nikon 7200.

ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Body - Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens (Includes manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Sigma 70-300mm f/4-5.6 SLD DG Macro Lens with built in motor - 52mm UV Protection Filter - Focus 5pc Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - BONUS!! HDMI cable for HDTV connection - Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Lens and Sigma 70-300mm f/4-5.6 SLD DG Macro Lens with built in motor + 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
